synopsis.text:
This captivating anime film is a masterful compilation of the first twelve episodes of its television counterpart, complete with enhanced sound effects and never-before-seen sequences. Set in the distant future of 3394, humanity finds itself clinging to survival aboard colossal spaceships, following the devastating destruction of our solar system over a millennium ago by an enigmatic alien race, the Gauna.

The Sidonia, a massive vessel teeming with over half a million survivors, once again finds itself in the crosshairs of the formidable Gauna. As the Gauna threatens to eradicate the remnants of humanity, a young man named Nagate Tanikaze emerges from the depths of the ship, rallying his friends to confront the seemingly invincible enemy.

Embark on a thrilling journey with Nagate and his allies as they strive to unravel the mysteries surrounding the Gauna, while simultaneously waging a desperate battle to safeguard humanity's existence. This anime promises an enthralling narrative and an immersive experience that will leave you eager for more.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
